title: Input Not Supported
body:
When I go to play a game, I can go through the champ select process just fine.  But when it's loading into the game (and actually loaded in, I hear the game) my input is not supported.  I've already tried going into config and adjusting my resolution there and it doesn't help anything.  At the moment, the game is literally unplayable for me.

Help!

replies.body:
This is an issue we're still looking into. We were able to deploy a fix that worked for some players, but we're still working on a permafix for everyone. If you're still experiencing this issue, I'd recommend trying to **ALT+ENTER** workaround once you enter the loading screen. This should toggle you out of Fullscreen mode (part of what's causing this to happen) and toss you into a Windowed Mode that should display with no issues.

Since I don't work on the team that deploys these fixes, I can't provide an ETA on when you can expect the permafix for this to go out, but if you have any other questions, let me know!
